settings.content: Thank you for choosing the Symmetry theme by Clean Themes.
Please note that all advert, product and slide images are copyright protected and included as example / setup help only; they are not for use in your live store.
Suggested logo sizes (dependent on position chosen): Same row: 260px w x 100px h Above: 260 - 400px w x 120px h Below: 260 - 400px w x 120px h

options.label: Aligned to top, centred, no tiling

settings.label: Upload a favicon
settings.info: convert your image to a 16x16 ico file before uploading

settings.label: Use lightbox for any images in text areas (blogs/pages/product descriptions)

settings.content: To use custom Google Web Fonts, go to [google.com/webfonts](http://www.google.com/webfonts) and pick your font. On the instructions section it will show you the address of the font, e.g 'http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Averia+Libre:700' - just enter the font part (eg: 'Averia+Libre:700') here, select 'Custom' and the template will do the rest.

options.value: Georgia, Utopia, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif
options.label: Georgia

settings.label: Show 'Register' link in main menu (requires customer accounts to be enabled in Settings > Checkout)
Automatically expand navigation to current page

settings.content: These are displayed under the main menu - great for promotions + notices

Use
for a new line in any text Ideal size for full width slides: 1600 x 500, 1200 wide for fixed width sites

Enter the letter of each row in the order you want them to show, separated with a hyphen. E.g. D-C-A-B-E Leave blank for default order A: Slider B: Text row C: Ad image D: Blog E: Product row 1 F: Product row 2 G: Product row 3 H: Collection list I: Custom HTML
This is to show an image, video or custom HTML, like Twitter feed
To show a smaller snippet of content on the homepage, edit your article and click 'Add an excerpt'. Note that this snippet will also show on the main blog listing.

Link to: The title text and 'See all' text will link to the collection chosen here Collection of products to display: Each product in this collection will show on the homepage You can choose the same collection for both settings
Shows a list of collection images

settings.label: Number of products to show per page

options.label: At bottom, under image, always visible
At bottom, over image, show on hover
At bottom, over image, always visible
Fully covers image, show on hover

settings.label: If under image, always visible, enter the height reserved for this area
settings.info: If your titles overlap your image - increase this number

settings.label: Automatic 'Only X left!' warning sticker upper limit
settings.info: Leave empty to not show. Will ONLY work for products with only one variant. Uses the 'Sold out' sticker color from above.

settings.label: Enable AJAX add-to-cart
settings.info: Disable this to go straight to the cart page after clicking add

settings.label: Show variant option and title when there is only one variant
Show name of option when only one dropdown visible

settings.content: Please note that the quick-buy drop down will not show on related products when using 'Tag-specified product handle'
Tag-specified collection example: meta-related-collection-bluedresses Tag-specified product handle example: meta-related-product-bluedress
Icons linking to your social networking sites
Enter the full URLs of your social sites, including http://
These allow visitors to share the page they are viewing, via their own social networks - select these to have them display in your store

settings.label: Enable 'terms & conditions' checkbox in the cart
Cart terms & conditions page to link to, if the above is activated

settings.content: Please note that if you have migrated to the Responsive Checkout, the following settings will be ignored.
The pages in the checkout process are styled differently to the rest of your store, and these settings for the logo are to ensure its correct display:
Add advert images here, link them to any pages. Ideal size 380w x 220h (px)

settings.label: Mailchimp form action link (begins http://) [?](http://cleanthemes.co.uk/symmetry/mailchimp) - leave blank to use built-in signup

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use here, refer to your first checkout page dropdown.
Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.
Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.

* For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://wiki.shopify.com/Do_Tell_Where_The_Money_Is) (“Do tell where the money is”).

settings.label: Maximum width of the blog articles (default 960)
Enable advanced nav
settings.info: Enables a more complex way of setting up multi-tier menus, not recommended for most people [READ THIS BEFORE ENABLING](http://cleanthemes.co.uk/symmetry/advanced-advanced-nav/)

settings.label: Letter-spacing
settings.info: Alters legibility of various sections of text across the site. For more advanced options, you will likely need to hire a developer
